__e: And you believe what you will, but it was neither I nor Flint... nor the Spanish raider who killed your wife.
I've been to Flint, and I'm sorry for them, but I don't know anything about it.
But now, if that man out there can fulfill his promise to us, if we can prevail over Flint and the governor... and I feel we can... I don't know why, but I feel it.
I tell you, if Flint is right... and we've been infiltrated, we're in real danger.
Flint said we need a king.
But there are some things that Captain Flint has done that cannot be defended.
Until and unless Captain Flint is successful in his endeavor, this ship is the only way we leave here alive.
Remind you that Flint hasn't been your biggest earner in quite some time.
But now, between you and Flint, I'm not certain who I should be more afraid of.
